effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Dispatch by 6% stacking up to 5 times. Dispatch has a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Roll the Bones has a 40% increased chance of granting additional combat enhancements and also applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! for each combat enhancement granted.

Stacks applied by Roll the Bones can exceed the normal Winning Streak! maximum of 5.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Hidden Shoulder
Ancient Hornswog Spaulders

spells.description: Use: Call in a ravenous ally and ride off into the sunset (or 15 yds, whichever is closest), inflicting 1.8 million Fire damage split between all enemies you ride through. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 398 Agility up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 103,381 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 155,079.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,399 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
